Music

I wrote, recorded, and produced my first EP, Look At Me, and released it in September 2018 under the name Kale. I recorded the vocals in the basement of my childhood home and produced the songs using ProTools. Instrumentals were created using a piano, a microKorg, and a variety of software synths. It is now available for streaming and purchase on Spotify, Apple Music, iTunes, and anywhere else music is available!
Following my first EP, I took some time to focus and polish my recording, production, and songwriting skills both on my own, and while working an internship at a recording studio in Cambridge, MA. I have since released two more singles, a second EP, and have a lot more on the way!
